Coding Portfolio

Here is a small collection of my favourite coding projects, which I've been working on lately. The full list of things I've been working on can be found on my GitHub account. I'm also WebDevBev on codepen, where I mess around with CSS sometimes!

  • Geese Games

    Technologies used:

    ES6

    React

    Styled-components

    First off, visit the 'Geese info' page to see all of the different types. On this page, you can click on each individual goose type to go to a page containing more detailed information about that goose. Then, you can put your knowledge to the test on the 'Quiz' page!
